page.title: 11OUR HOBBIES
page.content: We have hobbies. Hobbies are what you do sometimes in your free time. Perhaps snooker might be your hobby or sailing. You might have just one hobby or a few hobbies. Some hobbies are dangerous like bird shooting. You could shoot a little boy Some hobbies can be fun. If your hobby is cricket, that can be fun but you can get hit by the ball. In some hobbies you can win cups. When you play foot ball you can win the F.A. Cup or the Milk Cup. Some people like fishing. They catch fish. Some people have stamp collecting as a hobby. That can be very hard but interesting. Some like to search for butterflies or birds. Some people go for walks and some like to paint, draw or take photographs. Written by Stephen Low
